t: About us – Peter Lang Oxford
s: January 14, 2025 - Peter Lang Oxford is located in the heart of the historic university city and serves authors across the UK and Ireland. We publish a wide range of academic titles, including monographs and edited collections. We have particular strengths in modern languages, Irish studies, linguistics and theology.

t: About Peter Lang Publishing | Peter Lang Publishing
s: The Peter Lang Publishing Group is an international academic publishing house with offices based in Bern, Frankfurt, New York, Oxford and Brussels. Peter Lang, who founded the group, came from a family of renowned Swiss booksellers and publishers. He learned the technical side of publishing ...
